column5: Are there any top rated lodges/resorts on Lac Suel that allows pets? My wife and I would prefer one that offers the American plan. We have a 9 year old Gordon Setter that's a part of our family.
They allow dogs, but it is housekeeping plan.
If you are looking for walleyes, I'd check out Silver Water Wheel Lodge, www.sww-lodge.com. I've seen guests with pets at the lodge before. Give Mike a call and see.
I called Fisherman's Cove and was told they do not allow pets.Any other suggestions on quality resorts on Lac Suel besides Evergreen's?
http://www.ontariossunsetcountry.ca/...code/72/tbid/6Maybe you can find one in this listing.Good luck.Juls
Thanks Juls, this is just what I was looking for.
My wife is part of my family.....but there is no way I am going to take her to Canada with me! Same thing with my dog.
